com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasupport

Class DataChangeSupport<X>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasupport.DataChangeSupport<X>

  • public final class DataChangeSupport<X>
extends Object
    This is a utility class that can be used by similarly to PropertyChangeSupport. All DataChangeSupport instances uses dedicated thread to for all the work, so all events is processed asynchronously.
    Author:
    Tomas Hurka

    • Method Detail

      • addChangeListener

        public void addChangeListener(DataChangeListener<X> listener)
        Add a DataChangeListener to the listener list. The same listener object may be added only once.
        Parameters:
        listener - The DataChangeListener to be added

      • removeChangeListener

        public void removeChangeListener(DataChangeListener<X> listener)
        Remove a DataChangeListener from the listener list.
        Parameters:
        listener - The DataChangeListener to be removed

      • fireChange

        public void fireChange(Set<X> current,
              Set<X> added,
              Set<X> removed)
        Report a update to any registered listeners.
        Parameters:
        current - the set of currently available objects.
        added - the set of added objects since last event.
        removed - the set of removed objects since last event.
